content: this lemon pillow crochet pattern is a super fun summer crochet project you can make a lemon orange lime or grapefruit just by changing up the yarn colors this crochet lemon pillow will add some fun summer vibes to your decor this season - this pattern includes 62 high-quality images to help you with every step so its super beginner-friendly - printer-friendly version without progress photos is included as well - there are also video tutorials on the blog post of this crochet pattern download also includes a free squeeze the day pdf printable for a blank-inside card with original
